Text: Hi Gary,I know you will be starting TOWIE tonight but any chance u could find the latest 'Comic Relief' starring One Direction on their African trip. Many thx mate.

I'll have to try and get it for you later mate. I am waiting for TOWIE and gonna try to do a WEBRIP of it and post it first. I don't think people would be seeding the "Let's Dance for Comic Relief" episode before TOWIE is available.

Hey guys, I am calling it a day with uploading files. My health is not 100% and there are other people already uploading TOWIE. Hopefully they can continue to do so for future episodes as well as MIC. Thanks for all of your support and nice comments over the past couple of years XXXXXXXX
A million thank yous for everything you have done for us Gary.  You have been an absolute star.  I wish you the best of health.  See you in the church ;) xxxxx
Stay well, Gazza. Thanks for all your hard work in the past. We'll miss you.
Ignore my silly request Gary not important.  I wish you all the best and hope you are well enuf one day to return and bring more joy to us all who enjoyed your ul. chrs and god bless.....

my heart sunk when i read the coment :(
good luck in the future and hope your health gets better.
really appreciate the uploads Gaz.

Hopefully others upload MIC :)

Thanks a million guys xx
It has been a pleasure :)
Wish all of you my very best xxxxxxxxxx
